title: Laos Inflation Rate MoM
description: The Consumer Price Index in Laos increased 2.30 percent in October of 2022 over the previous month. Inflation Rate MoM in Laos averaged 0.57 percent from 2000 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 10.09 percent in June of 2022 and a record low of -1.86 percent in November of 2000. This page provides - Laos Inflation Rate MoM- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Bank of the Lao PDR
